name: Pork Chops O'Brien
comments: This was an instant favorite for us
ingredients: Garlic powder, salt and pepper to taste
1 bag (24oz.) hash browns (or 3-4 medium potatoes, peeled and chopped small)
instructions: Brown pork chops in skillet with butter; sprinkle with spices while browning. Place on bottom of 9x13" pan.
Mix together all remaining ingredients except french fried onions. Spread over pork chops and sprinkle with onions.
Bake for 35-45 min. or until bubbly, slightly brown around edges and pork is cooked through.
